Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24347 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.25.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-24347 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.25.4-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.25.4-1, affected by CVE-2020-24347
